column3: News;It has been reported that Mrs. Aung San Suu Kyi
column4: who serves as the Myanmar State Counsel and Minister of Foreign Affairs will pay an official visit to Cambodia in late April 2019.------This is her first official visit to Cambodia since she took the top post in 2016.------Mrs. Aung San Suu Kyi as well as leaders of several other countries will attend a forum in China and on will fly from Beijing to Phnom Penh on April 30
column6: Deputy Prime Minister and Minister for Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of the Kingdom of Cambodia visited  Myanmar for the 2nd Meeting of Joint Commission for Bilateral Cooperation between Myanmar and Cambodia on 1 February 2019.
